barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Negate all damage the next time I take damage

burned.name: Burned n
burned.description: Every round end, take n damage

creator.name: Creator n
creator.description: When I am deployed, create n lighthouses

cursed.name: Cursed n
cursed.description: Take n damage when I use an ability

dealer.name: Dealer
dealer.description: Draw a card at the start of every round

doomed.name: Doomed
doomed.description: Die at the end of this round

ghost.name: Ghost
ghost.description: Don't prevent the enemy from targeting what's behind me

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.description: Abilities that cost shinsu cost +1 shinsu

immune.name: Immune
immune.description: Cleanse and I am immune to negative effects

lastonestanding.name: Last One Standing
lastonestanding.description: If I am the only ally unit, I have +4 HP and deal +4 damage

lethal.name: Lethal
lethal.description: When I damage another unit, kill it

pierce.name: Pierce n
pierce.description: Destroy n when I deal damage

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: When I take damage, deal 1 damage to my attacker

regenerate.name: Regenerate
regenerate.description: Restore me to full HP at the end of each round

ruthless.name: Ruthless
ruthless.description: Deal +1 damage for each lighthouse the opponent has lost

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Enemies are forced to target me, if I am targetable
